name: Jolly Laughter
description:
Ho ho ho!

Surprise release everyone! 

These past weeks we've been blown away by all the support you've shown regarding our Pixel Pulps...  Lots and lots of DMs and replies in our twitter account.

SO THANK YOU!

And in order to give something back (you're all awesome!), we've decided to make and release Jolly Laughter, an interactive Christmas Card.

It's a short story, but we believe you'll find it... Interesting. 

Not to spoil anything, but this is how it starts:

You open your eyes and feel the cold chilling your bones. Sun is rising and you're naked in Central Park.

Cheers and happy holidays!
